The dress looks very cute in the photos and is, in fact, rather cute in person, but the fabric is too thin to hold its shape in person. It also runs quite small. I would order at least one size up, possibly two.
This dress this the hit of the party. I did have to fix the length. It was to long. Otherwise it looked very nice.

It's still super cute though I just needed to find something to go over that would look good with it and cover my arms.  I fortunately had something that worked.  I would recommend going up a size, I would normally wear an XL but purchased a 2XL and It works perfect.

评论概述: Will not go past the boobs!

评论概述: I feel like the recipient of a practical joke.
评论详情: This has to be the poorest made item of clothing I have ever received from Amazon. I have seen ‘cheap’ children’s costumes that are made of better materials. It is the thinnest 65% poly/35% cotton I have ever seen in my life. Perhaps they’re counting the thread as the ‘cotton’?  Anyway, I can’t believe I paid $37.00 for this, I feel robbed. I have already started the return process.
Fabric is thin but can live with it. Thanks.

评论概述: Costume-quality dress at a decent price
评论详情: Bought this dress as a Halloween costume--Minnie Mouse.  I usually wear a size 10 or 12 in dresses, so I ordered a Large.  The dress is made of very light weight slightly stretchy polyester.  I barely fit in the L size.  the waistline is just under my bust, and the skirt skims the top of my knee.  The princess seams help the top fit smoothly.  The skirt isn't full circle and will not accommodate a crinoline petticoat--as I had hoped it would.  I'll make do with a ruffled half-slip. So as a costume it will do, but I don't consider this dress suitable for actual daywear.
Cheaply made, ordered a size up and still fits a size too small.
